refnamediv.refpurpose: Writes audio data to the named software bus, mixing to the previous output.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Adds an audio signal to a channel of the named software bus. Implies declaring the channel with imode=2 (see also chn_a).

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sname -- a string that indicates which named channel of the software bus to write.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: aval -- the audio signal to write at performance time.
